name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zhi Xiaohong - Xiaohongshu AI All-in-One Assistant
name.zh_CN: 智小红 - 小红书AI全能助手

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xiaohongshu material watermark removal download (supporting batch note download) and many other practical features.
short.zh_CN: 小红书素材去水印下载（支持批量笔记下载）、笔记数据下载、博主笔记数据下载、AI拆解博主、多笔记批量下载评论 等超多实用功能。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ What is Zhi Xiaohong?  
Zhi Xiaohong is a powerful and efficient tool designed specifically for Xiaohongshu (Little Red Book, xiaohongshu, xhs) users, especially for content creators, market researchers, product designers, and operations professionals. It helps you deeply analyze competitor data, optimize marketing strategies, create viral content, and conduct competitor grass-planting analysis, significantly improving your operational efficiency!  

🔥🔥🔥 Limited-Time Offer  
Sign up and invite new users to get **3 extra days of Pro Membership**! Don’t miss out on this exclusive deal!  


New Features Are Here!  
1️⃣  My Favorites
allows one-click collection of notes and bloggers.

Core Features of Zhi Xiaohong 
🌟 1. High-Quality Media Downloads  
Easily download images and videos from Xiaohongshu notes, either individually or in batches, without watermarks. Enrich your media library effortlessly! 📸  

🌟 2. Note Data Downloads  
Batch download note details, including titles, authors, engagement metrics, and more. Gain a comprehensive understanding of note performance to create viral content! 📝  

🌟 3. Xiaohongshu Note Analysis  
Visualize note data with easy-to-read charts, helping you quickly grasp the commercial value of notes and optimize your content strategies! 📊  

🌟 4. Creator Data Analysis & Downloads
Get in-depth insights into a creator’s content style and market influence. Use this data to make informed collaboration decisions and find the perfect creators for your campaigns! 👩‍🎤  

🌟 5. Keyword Search  
Quickly analyze notes and creator data by keywords, and save the results to the cloud for convenient access anytime, anywhere! 🔑  

🌟 6. Prohibited Word Check  
Ensure compliance by checking for prohibited words in your content before publishing. Safeguard your content creation with ease! 🚫  

🌟 7. Batch Download Notes 
- Batch download notes by keywords  
- Batch download notes from specific creators  
- Batch download notes via links  

🌟 8. Batch Download Creator Data  
- Deeply analyze creator data, collect multiple creators’ data at once, and organize it into lists for easy management and efficiency! 


🎉 Why Choose Zhi Xiaohong?  
Zhi Xiaohong is a powerful tool for Xiaohongshu operations, offering features like high-quality media downloads, data analysis, batch downloads, and more. It’s designed to help you boost your content creation and data analysis capabilities, making your operations more efficient than ever! 💪  

Disclaimer
Zhi Xiaohong is not an official Xiaohongshu plugin. Xiaohongshu™ is a trademark of Xiaohongshu Inc., and Zhi Xiaohong is not affiliated with Xiaohongshu™ or Xiaohongshu Inc.  

Try Zhi Xiaohong now and unlock new skills for your operations journey! 🎉
long.zh_CN:
✨ 智小红是什么？ 
智小红是一款专为小红书（xiaohongshu、xhs）平台用户打造的高效运营工具，尤其适合博主、市场调研、产品设计和运营岗位人士。它能够深入分析竞品数据，助力爆文创作、营销策略制定以及竞品种草分析，大幅提升运营效率！

🔥🔥🔥 限时福利 
注册并邀请新用户，即可额外获赠 3天专业会员！快来开启你的数据分析之旅吧！  

新功能上线！
1️⃣ 我的收藏
一键收藏笔记&博主：上线收藏功能，通过一键收藏笔记&博主，创建个人收藏夹到云端，进行标记存储以便日后查阅。

智小红的核心功能
🌟 1. 高清素材下载  
支持单个或批量下载小红书笔记中的图片和视频，自动去水印，丰富你的创作素材库！📸  

🌟 2. 笔记数据下载  
一键批量下载笔记内容，包括标题、作者、互动量等详细数据，全面掌握笔记指标，助你产出爆款内容！📝  

🌟 3. 小红书笔记分析
通过图表直观展示笔记数据，快速理解笔记的商业价值，优化内容策略，轻松提升运营效果！📊  

🌟 4. 博主数据分析及下载
深度了解博主的内容特点和市场影响力，为合作决策提供数据支持，找到最适合你的博主！👩‍🎤  

🌟 5. 关键词搜索
支持关键词快速分析笔记和博主数据，还能收藏到云端，随时随地查阅，方便又高效！🔑  

🌟 6. 违禁词检查  
发布内容前一键检查违禁词，确保合规性，为你的内容创作保驾护航！🚫  

🌟 7. 笔记批量下载 
- 支持关键词笔记批量下载  
- 博主笔记批量下载  
- 笔记链接批量下载  

🌟 8. 博主数据批量下载
- 深度拆解博主数据，一键采集多个博主数据，轻松整理成表格，效率翻倍！


🎉 智小红的优势 
智小红是一款功能强大的小红书运营神器，不仅提供高清素材下载、数据分析、批量下载等多种实用功能，还能助你快速提升内容创作与数据分析能力，让运营变得更加高效！💪  

免责声明
智小红插件并非小红书官方插件。小红书™ 是小红书 Inc. 的商标，智小红与小红书™ 或小红书 Inc. 没有任何关系。  

快来试试智小红，解锁你的运营新技能吧！🎉
